titleStmt.title: A new letter from London-Derry giving a farther account of the late good success, obtain'd by the protestants in Ireland, against the French and Irish papists: with the speech of that reverend divine, and protestant champion, Mr. VValker, to the soldiers of that garrison, before they made that last great sally upon the enemy.
titleStmt.author: Walker, George, of Londonderry.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
